Description:
Skills:
- Excellent organizational skills ensure smooth and efficient receiving operations.
- Attention to detail to accurately inspect and record incoming shipments.
- Strong communication skills coordinate with suppliers, internal departments, and team members.
- Ability to work under pressure and in a fast-paced.
Familiarity with inventory management systems to track and manage incoming and outgoing shipments.
- Basic computer skills to record and update data in electronic systems.
- Physical stamina and ability to lift and carry heavy items.
- Knowledge of safety procedures and protocols to ensure a safe working environment.
- Problem-solving abilities to address any issues or discrepancies with incoming shipments.
- Flexibility to adapt to changing needs and priorities in pre hotel setting.
- Customer service skills to handle guest requests related to receiving operations.Job Details
